meanings.definition: To convert to the metric system.
meanings.sent1: She metricizes the measurements from inches to centimeters.
meanings.sent2: The scientist metricizes the data for accuracy.
meanings.sent3: The baker metricizes the recipe, making sure to use grams instead of ounces.
meanings.sent4: His mind metricizes the world into neat, orderly units.
meanings.sent5: The teacher metricizes the lesson, simplifying it for the students.

meanings.definition: To measure or evaluate using the metric system.
meanings.sent1: He metricizes the distance in kilometers rather than miles.
meanings.sent2: The engineer metricizes the dimensions of the building in meters.
meanings.sent3: The cat metricizes the height of the shelf, deciding if it's a good jumping distance.
meanings.sent4: Her gaze metricizes the room, taking in every detail with precision.
meanings.sent5: The app metricizes your daily steps, showing them in kilometers for better understanding.
